channel.title: Chess Tournament Update: New Bracket!
channel.description:
Who would be interested in having a chess tournament?
[size=36pt]Congratulations CodeForFame on winning the tournament!!![/size]
[u][b]Currently interested:[/b][/u]
[ol][li]The Wanderer[/li] [li]Davidi2[/li] [li]Krackkid[/li] [li]baddy351[/li] [li]Reyx7[/li] [li]Kozs[/li] [li]MistaBigBoss[/li] [li]sinisoul[/li] [li]CodeForFame[/li] [li]Taharok[/li] [li]Scarecrows[/li] [li]The Outsider[/li][/ol]
[u][b]Rules:[/b][/u]
[ul][li]Everyone who wants to enter, can[/li] [li]Each round lasts exactly 7 days[/li] [li]If someone doesn't play within that time frame, they are automatically disqualified and their opponent will proceed (the opponent must show activity by posting on here)[/li] [li]If both users of a match fail to play or post within the week, they are both eliminated and their adjacent bracket winner will receive a by[/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/2128/cffu.jpg[/img]

item.title: Chess Tournament Update: New Bracket!
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

http://www.chess.com/livechess/game.html?id=245284428 - game 1

http://www.chess.com/livechess/game.html?id=245288396 - game 2

http://www.chess.com/livechess/game.html?id=245299996 - game 3

Uhm, not sure. I think it was suggested that there could be a checkers tourny next? I know you are against it because it is a solved game, but I feel it would be a pretty nice idea. Do one chess tournament and then one checkers and so on.

Read full topic

item.title: Chess Tournament Update: New Bracket!
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:587, topic:419849”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=522386.msg3902448#msg3902448 date=1327882171]

I guess I win?

It’s impossible to work out times with CFF.
[/quote]You didn’t show up at our last scheduled time…

reyx7:

I went on irc maybe 15 mins late and didn’t find you. Then again on Friday. I’ve never seen you on IRC, I tried the 4 major channels.

You also changed the time multiple times before that, and I was flexible enough to agree to all of them. Also, we never even said anything about Friday until Saturday (the day after).

In short, stop blaming it on me, when you’ve been the one picking the time, rescheduling, and then don’t show up.

15 minutes late… I lead a busy schedule, I have many things to do. I had to change the time because I had error with timezone translation. I’ve told you multiple times that I’m free during weekends. Here I am, posting 2 minutes after you, and always, I see this:

As always, offline. I’ve never seen you online, I’ve never seen you on IRC.[/quote]So, you expect me to wait around for how long? I’m busy as well, and have been very accommodating. You changed it multiple times, and only one time you said it was due to your misunderstanding of time zones.

Also, this is the first time I’m seeing that you’re free during weekends.

I’m on the forums right now, and have been browsing/replying since I made this post. Why it says I’m offline, I have no idea (maybe because I was viewing a board you can’t would be my best guess).

Every time I said I’d be on IRC I was. You’re just expecting me to be on IRC 24/7, even though I’ve told you I can’t because of the network I use at certain times.

Edit: You can’t see my online status because I disabled it a very, very long time ago.

Edit 2: I’m on live chess right now, I’m also in #mopar and #moparscape.

Edit 3: It’s been 15 minutes, and still no sign of you… I’ll still stay on live chess, and be sitting in #mopar and #moparscape.

Edit 4: He got on right after the last edit.

I won 2-0.

Read full topic

item.title: Chess Tournament Update: New Bracket!
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:570, topic:419849”]This is the most confusing tourney ever XD

In the future we should just assign dates :P[/quote]I think the main reason is the time zone differentials and it all being online haha. I would assign dates, but sometimes people have to go places and I don’t think it would be fair that they missed their scheduled date and had to drop because of irl commitments.

Read full topic
